snippet: The decision to shut some American diplomatic posts in the Middle East has prompted gloating among jihadists and criticism by some officials who say the Obama administration overreacted.
abstract: Obama administration's decision to shut some American diplomatic posts in the Middle East in response to terrorist threat has prompted gloating among jihadists and criticism by some officials who say administration overreacted.

byline.original: By ROBERT F. WORTH and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: The decision to shut some American diplomatic posts in the Middle East has prompted gloating among jihadists and criticism by some officials who say the Obama administration overreacted.

headline.main: Caustic Light on White House’s Reaction to  a Terrorist Threat
headline.print_headline: Caustic Light On Response To a Threat Of Terrorism
